description: The Magic Mountain Vermont Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.

Alexa, ask Magic Mountain Vermont for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Magic Mountain Vermont
